title: Monte Bianco: chestnut, chocolate and coffee dacquoise
description: A spectacular cake with layers of chestnut and coffee mousses sandwiched with almond meringue, topped with hazelnut meringues, chocolate shards and praline.Equipment and preparation: You will need a 20cm/8in wide ring mould, at least 8cm deep, a chocolate transfer sheet (or plain acetate sheet) and a chef’s blowtorch.
ingredients: 7g leaf gelatine, soaked in cold water for five minutes
7g leaf gelatine, soaked in cold water for five minutes
250g/9oz unsalted butter, softened, cut into small pieces
5g leaf gelatine, soaked in cold water for five minutes
200g/7oz dark chocolate bittersweet (around 70% cocoa solids), chopped
